alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 31 at 3:04PM PDT until November 01 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 39 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast and Santa Ynez Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
